const styleSheet=document.styleSheets[0];const keyframes="\n@keyframes float {\n  0%, 100% { \n    transform: translateY(0px) rotate(0deg) scale(1);\n    opacity: 0.6;\n  }\n  50% { \n    transform: translateY(-20px) rotate(180deg) scale(1.1);\n    opacity: 0.8;\n  }\n}\n@keyframes spin {\n  0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }\n  100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }\n}\n";// Inject keyframes into the document
if(styleSheet){styleSheet.insertRule(keyframes,styleSheet.cssRules.length);}export default Dashboard;
